title: Zac Chroma Skin Bug
body: When choosing a skin for Zac (in normals is what I've experienced so far), I am unable to select a Chroma color for him. Tried choosing another skin and returning to the original and it keeps the name from the other skin displayed over the original. After getting into the game, I noticed that I was using the Pink  skin, which I had chosen in a game played before the patch update. I was not allowed to choose the color of Chroma.

replies.body:
Hey John C Reilly,

Thanks for the report! It looks like the skin select section may have glitched out here. If you're still having this issue, please let me know!
